subject: Football
Colleges and Universities
Cellular Telephones
lead_paragraph: Arthur Brown Jr., 16,  can run a 40-yard dash in 4.47 seconds and he already has more than 50 scholarship offers. What he doesn’t have is a cellphone.
snippet: Arthur Brown Jr., 16,  can run a 40-yard dash in 4.47 seconds and he already has more than 50 scholarship offers. What he doesn’t have is a cellphone.
